name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then add minced garlic.
Drain spaghetti and add it to the pan with bacon and garlic.
Remove from heat, add the egg and cheese mixture, and toss quickly to coat the spaghetti.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until browned.
Remove chicken and sauté chopped onions in the same pan.
Add tomato puree, spices, and cook until the mixture thickens.
Add the chicken back to the pan and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Let cool before serving.

name: Omelette
steps: Melt butter in pan
Whisk eggs
Add salt and pepper
Cook slowly
Hope for the best

name: Burger
steps: Cook beef
Put in bun

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in taco seasoning and a bit of water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill shells with beef mixture, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Top with sour cream and serve.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
steps: Whisk soy sauce, honey, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger in a bowl.
Marinate salmon in the sauce for 10 minutes.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Cook salmon skin-side down for 4-5 minutes, then flip and cook 2-3 more minutes.
Pour remaining marinade into the pan and simmer until thickened.
Serve salmon with sauce drizzled on top, garnished with sesame seeds and green onions.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat.
Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and hoisin sauce, mix well.
Drizzle with sesame oil before serving.

name: Greek Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Top with crumbled feta cheese and serve.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Melt butter in a pan and sauté onion until golden.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute.
Add spices and cook for 30 seconds.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend the sauce if desired, then return to heat.
Add chicken and cook until done.
Stir in cream, simmer for 5 more minutes, and serve.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large pan, heat butter and olive oil.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, sauté for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 2 minutes.
Drain pasta and toss with shrimp and sauce.
Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Mix fish sauce, soy sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar in a bowl.
Heat oil in a pan, cook chicken until done.
Push chicken aside, scramble eggs in the same pan.
Add noodles and sauce, stir-fry until combined.
Add bean sprouts and green onions, toss well.
Serve with peanuts sprinkled on top.

name: Miso Soup
steps: Heat dashi stock in a pot over medium heat.
Add tofu and nori, simmer for 5 minutes.
Dissolve miso paste in a ladle with some hot broth, then stir into soup.
Add green onions and serve hot.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.
